name: moldable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a soft substance) able to be made into any shape: The shoe is made of moldable plastic. The right combination of sugar and water can result in a firm and moldable sugar mixture. Synonym
malleable
(of a person) able to be changed or influenced: I prefer a moldable youngster, who can be developed. Some believe that older workers will not be up to speed with new technology, and that they will be less moldable. Synonym
malleable
More examplesFewer examplesHe applied pressure and heated the mixture, getting a new and moldable material.Bone Cement polymerizes in stages, offering surgeons the option to inject it as a liquid or to shape it as a moldable putty.New hires are moldable in their impressions and perceptions of your organization.
